entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:15 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
